channel.title: ToragRevolution
channel.description:
[ul][hr] [b][img]http://img03.picoodle.com/img/img03/3/10/29/f_1m_5c8adb6.png[/img][/b]
[b]Completion:[/b] [img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useron.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useroff.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useroff.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useroff.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useroff.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useroff.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useroff.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useroff.gif[/img][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/useroff.gif[/img]
Updates will be posted in this section of the topic: [iurl=#updates]Click here[/iurl]
[b]Introduction:[/b] This server has many things to it that make it very clean, and sassy. For instance, you should check out the features. I have nothing pretty much to say except that this is going to be released sometime next month or so. Hopefully it'll come along pretty well. We'll probably be focusing on cleaning more things up, and instancing the client. No client will be special for this, and we are trying to make this source compatible with other peoples likings. For example, Czar and Dodian methods will be used, and altered. And also it isn't all created just by me. People like Steven work on it too, its basically me and his.
Oh one more thing, its also a 317 server.
Here are the features that we have already, of coarse there will be a lot more to come.
[b]Features:[/b]
[*][list]Anti Flood[/list] [*][list]Extremely clean[/list] [*][list]Completely new packet 53[/list] [*][list]New Emote Methods[/list] [*][list]No Lag[/list] [*][list]Most Skills[/list] [*][list]Packaged[/list] [*][list]Event Manager[/list] [*][list]Action Throttle Manager[/list] [*][list]No Thread per Client[/list] [*][list]ID List[/list] [*][list]Ability to hold 377 Cache[/list] [*][list]New Methods[/list] [*][list]Easy teleport ways[/list] [*][list]Added working thieving shop[/list] [*][list]New method for gem crafting[/list] [*][list]New method for fletching[/list] [*][list]New method for item On item[/list] [*][list]New dialogue method[/list] [*][list]Full Emotes[/list] [*][list]Full Eating[/list] [*][list]Almost full magic[/list][/ul] Pictures below, they suck I know but its a start.
[b]Some pictures:[/b]
[b][img]http://img33.picoodle.com/img/img33/3/10/29/f_m_4131bf3.png[/img][/b]
[b][img]http://img33.picoodle.com/img/img33/3/10/29/f_1m_b58373f.png[/img][/b] [hr]
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/selected.gif[/img] [b][anchor=updates]Updates: Latest November 07[/anchor][/b]
[i]November 07:[/i] Never knew that the week went so fast, I'll be working on it more this weekend. Also, Steven is back and I except both of us to try are hardest in getting the source released soon. Get ready!
[i]November 02:[/i] Right now I added a easy thing to change. Now, you can setup what items you want the player that cannot trade. I made it myself, and it isn't very hard to do, but it adds some nice feel to the server while customizing.
[i]November 01:[/i] Will add a better method for commands sooner or later, plus added some more methods to clear up my Client.java. Soon to be cleaned out, also pretty much no more == true anymore, all fixed.
Also note that I might be adding a better way for Item Requirements.
[i]October 30th: [/i]Right now, I'll be adding a couple of commands, probably going to do it the regular way, but in time make it shorter and easier. As you might have guessed, the Client.java is still being used heavily, soon - probably once I'm almost done to release the Beta, it will be shorter and everything will be in certain files, handled etc. It will not cause any lag too. So, some commands today, and I'll get back to you if I do anything more.
I also added a anti flood protector, I tried it and it does work.
[i]October 29th: [/i]At the moment, I'm adding one of the quests that I did with my other server, also released it. But it won't be in the process, it'll be first loaded when you start the game, and changed when it needs to causing less lag. But hold on, it won't be full, it'll be a base as I want this source to be fully customizable.
Fixed many statements, about 500 or so characters less in Client.java now. Most of it is fixed, now time for the quest.

item.title: ToragRevolution
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“sir pk p00n, post:66, topic:239897”]few thing i would tell you to do is this,

NPC and player package should be in a “model” package.
You should try and get nio or xsocket to work, “xsocket was based of the nio libaries and its easyer”
also you if you havent alrdy, use getters and setters[/quote]
And packages, by convention, should be lower-case.

Read full topic

[/quote]

Well the whole source is going to be one giant base, which all you have to do pretty much is add numbers, and various accessories.
Although, it can be easily changed.

Don’t lie and claim that Delta worked on this junk with you.
I know Steven very well and he didn’t work on this junk.
Don’t try to make this client look good with a name that is known,that’s just sad.

You claim that steven is also working on this client with you,did you not?
He didn’t work on this.
Delta? Client?

Huh lol?

It’s not the Steven your thinking of, he doesn’t go by it on Mopar, he goes by x Blitz x or w.e.[/quote]
oh

Dude This Looks Awesome I Wish i Could Repp
[/quote]He didn’t even release it… why would you rep him, you don’t know if he’s lying? He’s most likely not lying, but if he were, you would be repping for no reason.

I don’t get it…? lol
[/quote]Just doesn’t make sense to give rep to an Idea, or showing your progress. Anyone could be just making up random shit that sounds totally rad and everyone would rep them, because it sounds so cool. So what’s the point of giving rep, unless they release, or show definite proof. Although, I’m sure you wouldn’t be lying.

know what im sayin?[/quote]

Proof before rep, I get it…

Anyways, nah I’m not lieing, and come on, lie about this?
